definition: lanthanoid (rare earth series), namely: lanthanum La57 鑭|镧[lan2], cerium Ce58 鈰|铈[shi4], praseodymium Pr59 鐠|镨[pu3], neodymium Nd60 釹|钕[nu:3], promethium Pm61 鉕|钷[po3], samarium Sm62 釤|钐[shan1], europium Eu63 銪|铕[you3], gadolinium Gd64 釓|钆[ga2], terbium Tb65 鋱|铽[te4], dysprosium Dy66 鏑|镝[di1], holmium Ho67 鈥|钬[huo3], erbium Er68 鉺|铒[er3], thulium Tm69 銩|铥[diu1], ytterbium Yb70 鐿|镱[yi4], lutetium Lu71 鑥|镥[lu3]

sentences.english: The catalytic converter on your exhaust system contains cerium and lanthanum.
sentences.chinese: 排气系统上的接触反应器含有铈和镧。

sentences.english: Used to make petro- chem catalyst. Also used to manufacture lanthanum metal.
sentences.chinese: 作石油化工催化剂，也可用来生产金属镧。

sentences.english: The analysis of tilt boundary observed in lanthanum chromates was made.
sentences.chinese: 对观察到的铬酸镧倾斜晶界进行了分析。

sentences.english: Etch defects of Nd_s La_(1-x)PP have been observed by Etch method.
sentences.chinese: 用腐蚀法观察了五磷酸镧钕晶体的腐蚀缺陷。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of lanthanum chloride on serum inflammation media in diabetic rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨稀土三氯化镧对糖尿病大鼠炎症介质的影响。

sentences.english: Crystalline lanthanum carbonate was synthesized using ammonium bicarbonate as the precipitant.
sentences.chinese: 以碳酸氢铵为沉淀剂合成了碳酸镧晶体。

sentences.english: The standard solution is added lanthanum nitrate solution as much as the sample.
sentences.chinese: 标准溶液也同样品一样加入相同量硝酸镧溶液。

sentences.english: He called lanthanum carbonate "a helpful addition to our armamentarium."
sentences.chinese: 他形容碳酸镧对于整体是有帮助的。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the relation between the radioactivity in Lanthanum products and the origins of RE Chlorides.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析镧产品中放射性与氯化稀土来源的关系。

sentences.english: Nano-powder of lanthanum chromites were synthesized by low-temperature combustion method.
sentences.chinese: 用低温燃烧合成法合成了铬酸镧纳米粉体。

sentences.english: We analyze the effect of synthetic time on lanthanum chromites granularity at 1450℃ in this article.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重分析合成时间对铬酸镧粉末性状的影响。

definition: see 釕銱兒|钌铞儿[liao4 diao4 r5]/Taiwan pr. [liao3]
